post.body:
i don't know if anyone can read the chinese text from a bit ago, i poorly translated it online:

This zerome should add the ability to quit hubs. Otherwise, add a few hub, which hub can not choose to speak.


Zeronet is a small multi-user operating system based on the network hardware layer. Truly the network layer has a self-owned personal network pc, no external management of your network computer.

Want to have a network PC operating system? Welcome to zeronet. Ownership of this network computer will be your own, no longer have the administrator to manage your own network computer. Realize the network interoperability stand-alone.

If www is a Microsoft operating system, zeronet is the linux operating system.

Perhaps there will be better, zeronet has achieved a prototype.

Of course, many people do not like and accept the rudimentary interface of linux. But it is indeed free and unlikely to be poisoned.

Perhaps www's Ddos attack does not exist in zeronet.
